AbstractText.sentence: CRP activates acs transcription by binding tandem DNA sites located upstream of the major promoter, acsP2.

AbstractText.sentence: Here, we used electrophoretic mobility shift assays and DNase I footprint analyses to demonstrate that the nucleoid proteins FIS and IHF each bind multiple sites within the acs regulatory region, that FIS competes successfully with CRP for binding to their overlapping and neighbouring sites and that IHF binds independently of either FIS or CRP.
